badVibes.label: Bad Vibes
badVibes.description: This user gives off bad vibes

debate.label: Political or religious debate
debate.description: This message is part of, or is likely to cause, a political or religious debate

harassment.label: Harassment
harassment.description: This user is harassing me or someone else

inappropriate.label: Inappropriate Content
inappropriate.description: This message or one of its attachments contains inappropriate material

modAbuse.label: Mod Abuse
modAbuse.description: This moderator is abusing their power

offensive.label: Offensive Content
offensive.description: This message or one of its attachments is mean, rude, or belittling

nominate.label: Nominate for an Award
nominate.description: This user deserves to be awarded :ember:

promotion.label: Self-promotion
promotion.description: This message includes unapproved self-promotion outside of #streaming or #game-deals-and-trades

scam.label: Scam or Phishing
scam.description: This message contains a scam or phishing attempt
